categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Belaya Rist was a female individual who was the CEO of CryonCorp and was also a Rebel Alliance sympathizer. After witnessing the destruction of the planet Alderaan by the Galactic Empire from Delaya nearby, she invited the Alliance to hijack several shipments of low-feedback scanners and was a close ally of secret Alliance leader Senator Bail Organa.
